text: @sarahcpr @ChrisMurphyCT As a subscriber to Twitter, an inundating number of theories are being sloshed around that may cure one’s Coronavirus. Ignoring the daily press briefing may be a start. It could save your life and a chance to maintain your sanity. @realDonaldTrump is not the source of the remedy.
